cause.description:
In this group, I want to help make the world realize we are all the same no matter who we love, who we choose to sleep with, who we are attracted to and that we are all equal. I want to show the world that this isn`t the 19th century anymore and more and more people are coming out.. HELLO WORLD WAKE UP AND GET USE TO IT. GAYS ARE HERE, PROUD, AND HERE TO STAY!!
1. To help everyone to see that homosexuals wheather male or female should be treated as equals
cause.mission: Make people realize that gay & lesbian people have rights and should be treated as equals just like everyone else!!
cause.name: Gay Rights
